text: Motorola is unveiling the Razr 60 and Razr 60 Ultra at an event on April 24, and a new Edge model might join the foldables too. Today MediaMarkt, a big European retailer, has mistakenly listed the Razr 60 Ultra and the Edge 60 Pro ahead of schedule. This has revealed their prices and specs. Let's jump in. The Razr 60 Ultra will apparently cost €1,299.99 in the Eurozone where it will be offered in two colorways: Scarab and Mountain Trail. It has a 7-inch LTPO AMOLED folding screen with 1224x2992 resolution and 165 Hz refresh rate, a 4" cover display, the Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC, 16GB of RAM, 512GB of storage, three 50 MP cameras, and a 4,500 mAh battery with support for 68W wired charging. When opened, it measures 171.5 x 74 x 7.19 mm. It weighs 199g and runs Android 15. Motorola Razr 60 Ultra official images The Motorola Edge 60 Pro is listed for €599.99 and offered in Dazzling Blue and Shadow colorways. It has a 6.67-inch pOLED screen with 1220x2712 resolution and 144 Hz refresh rate, the Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 SoC, 12GB of RAM, 512GB of storage, a 50 MP main camera, a 50 MP ultrawide, a 12 MP telephoto camera, a 60 MP selfie snapper, and a 5,000 mAh battery with support for 90W wired charging as well as wireless charging. It runs Android 15. Motorola Edge 60 Pro official images This listing makes us believe that the Edge 60 Pro is also getting official tomorrow, but that hasn't been confirmed. Stay tuned. Motorola is unveiling the Razr 60 and Razr 60 Ultra at an event on April 24, and a new Edge model might join the foldables too. Today MediaMarkt, a big European retailer, has mistakenly listed the Razr 60 Ultra and the Edge 60 Pro ahead of schedule. This has revealed their prices and specs. Let's jump in.

The Razr 60 Ultra will apparently cost €1,299.99 in the Eurozone where it will be offered in two colorways: Scarab and Mountain Trail. It has a 7-inch LTPO AMOLED folding screen with 1224x2992 resolution and 165 Hz refresh rate, a 4" cover display, the Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC, 16GB of RAM, 512GB of storage, three 50 MP cameras, and a 4,500 mAh battery with support for 68W wired charging. When opened, it measures 171.5 x 74 x 7.19 mm. It weighs 199g and runs Android 15.


Motorola Razr 60 Ultra official images

The Motorola Edge 60 Pro is listed for €599.99 and offered in Dazzling Blue and Shadow colorways. It has a 6.67-inch pOLED screen with 1220x2712 resolution and 144 Hz refresh rate, the Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 SoC, 12GB of RAM, 512GB of storage, a 50 MP main camera, a 50 MP ultrawide, a 12 MP telephoto camera, a 60 MP selfie snapper, and a 5,000 mAh battery with support for 90W wired charging as well as wireless charging. It runs Android 15.

This listing makes us believe that the Edge 60 Pro is also getting official tomorrow, but that hasn't been confirmed. Stay tuned.
